attributes.review:
What a horrifying sight to see a Cheeto with a horrid hair cut. You might as well show me Dora the Explorer on crack. This app must be removed and ban by all governments. If you downloaded this app and kept it you must be seriously ill. It was so disgusting to see a Cheeto working out naked and trump supporters should be arrested as well as those saying “Trump 2020”. Please remove this app. Those voting for trump this next upcoming election, I WILL SUE YOU AND YOUR COMPANY, you will get a call from my non existent lawyers, thank you very much. 
DELETE THIS APP AND BAN IT FOR THE WHOLE WORLD.
attributes.title: Would give zero stars if I could!!! 🤮🤮🤢

attributes.review: I was very disappointed and scared that I saw my culture being disrespected and saw actions against what they’ve said before about stanning my beautiful papi shrek like I can’t even believe how embarrassing it was and how much it took a toll on my profession and the impact and lack of education taught to my aspiring future Kings of the swamp just like their dad Shrek I’m truly dissatisfied and expecting more not only did they do this but they even bullied my kid for their skin color a beautiful green and on top of that the app kept lagging and glitching what a disappointment
attributes.title: Wow😩

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see when the clowns were coming to my town, the app was working perfect at first, after a couple of days, I noticed my complexion had a orange tint, at first i thought it was the new sunless tanning lotion I had bought, but then I realized that I didn’t use it yet, but then my guinea pigs were biting me because they thought I was a Cheeto , I knew this app was up to something so I deleted it, the next day they orangeness went away, be careful with this app, it could turn orange 🧡😏
attributes.title: This app turns you orange 😏🧡

attributes.review: The app is so slow and glitchy, it seems rushed and not much care was put into it. I downloaded it to see what Trump has to offer and to view his platform. The content is incredibly biased and concerning. Nothing is straightforward with facts, it seems as tho everything written is trying its hardest to persuade you to be very prejudice and intolerant towards others. It is very clear, after viewing this app in full, that Trump wishes to separate us by hate instead of uniting the country, and im not here for it.
attributes.title: So poorly made

attributes.review: I got this app out of boredom and then I started getting threatening emails saying that they know I am an international student and they are sending ICE to come and deport me 😭 I don’t want to leave but the orange Cheeto is coming after me- I’ve started having dreams where Cheetos are chasing me down the street but I never seem to make any progress, I’m running and running and running but they won’t leave me alone... only get this app if you are fine with running away from an orange Oompa Loompa for the rest of your life
attributes.title: Please don’t deport me 😭

attributes.review: I GOT THIS APP THINKING IT WAS AN EDUCATIONAL APP FOR 2020. I was horribly mistaken when I saw a Cheeto crawling across my screen. This Cheeto looked eerily similar to this thing called a “president” I keep seeing on the news obviously not, it’s just an idiotic Cheeto, anyone can see that. Thankfully I was able to delete the app before further damage was done to my brain cells. Keep me in your thoughts as I continue on my therapy sessions all thanks to this horrid download!!! Please download with caution, by that I mean don’t download at all. Cheers! 😌💅 Trump 2020✨🥰🧚🏼‍♂️ but six feet under🧚‍♀️🌸💞💖
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: This app had so many problems with it. 🙄There were bugs literally everywhere. And why do I have to put my number in it in order to look at the rest of the app, so annoying!!😤in addition when I tried to get into an event it was already booked.....ugh i was furious and it’s all the apps fault🤬finally. It took so long for everything to load, and my patience is very short so I could not wait the extra 2 seconds for it to load...😠🤬
attributes.title: Stupid App has too many bugs

attributes.review:
i got this app and when i tell you i was mortified I MEAN IT! i saw an orange wrinkly gnome and i was scared to death this app is absolute garbage and nobody should have to see such disturbing images. then i looked over and my cats started levitating and my fan fell from the ceiling this app is not only ugly but it’s demonic my couch started flying! i am not just dissatisfied i’m disgusted, scared, horrified, revolted, sickened,repeled, nauseated, and displeased i’m barry the bee, anyway folks i hope this app is banned from the app store until next time 

i hope u like jazz.

- sincerely barry 🐝
attributes.title: ATROCIOUS BEHAVIOR😳

attributes.review: this app is terrible, let’s first start off with the picture. it’s of the most ugly man i’ve ever seen. i almost threw up just seeing this. all of the 5 stars on this app is fake. trump bought bots to leave 5 star ratings so the app will become “popular”. obviously it won’t. once i opened the app the quality was terrible. it was forcing me to vote for “donald J trump” in which i don’t want to. please for the sake of apple’s policies, remove this app. nobody enjoys it, and it’s just a pain to look at. thank you, good day.
attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever seen

attributes.review: im not like most of these kids giving this app a bad rating to take down trump, but this app is actual trash. if i could give it 0 stars i would. it takes up too much space, it makes my phone lag and i have a brand new phone with a load of space so it shouldn't be doing this. my phone dies way faster now i have to keep it charging almost all day 🤦🏽‍♀️ i do not recommend this app. the orange man has failed AGAIN. this app cant be fixed too much is wrong
attributes.title: i am so disappointed
